dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3835 IH: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to award the Air Medal to Thomas Dewey Wise for service as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Mace introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to award the Air Medal to Thomas Dewey Wise for service as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War.

section.header: Authorization for award of Air Medal to Thomas Dewey Wise for service as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War
section.text: Notwithstanding any time limitation with respect to the awarding of certain decorations to persons who served in the Armed Forces, the Secretary of the Army is authorized to award the Air Medal to Thomas Dewey Wise, for his service as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War.
